case_address_found_1: hillside near Tyler Avenue and California Avenue
case_circumstances: Body found on a remote hillside in Riverside.  He was nude and face down.  His clothing was located near him on a rock. His shoes and socks were scattered  The shirt and pants were inside out..  No sign of trauma was found.  No identification or matching missing person has been located.
case_head_hair: Dark brown hair with some gray mix worn short, about 2 inches in length
case_body_hair: Chest hair appeared to have been shaved off at some point and was in the process of growing back

Clothing was clean and in good condition
